name: Squid Space
description:
Squid Space is a pixel art, arcade style, action game where the more you collect the faster you move. Navigate the 35 levels and watch out for Crabs, Reefs, Turtles and more. Play through all the levels in order or skip around to the final boss.

Controls

  • Arrow keys/WASD to move.
  • That's it!

Hope you like it!
